message.name: ERR_PROSPECTEMPLOYER_FV_REGISTEREDNAME_SHORT
message.locale: The prospect employer registered name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTEMPLOYER_FV_TRADINGNAME_SHORT
message.locale: The prospect employer trading name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTEMPLOYER_FV_TRADINGNAME_OR_REGISTEREDNAME_NOTENTERED
message.locale: You must either enter the Registration Name or Trading Name in their respective fields.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTEMPLOYER_XFV_REG_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: Prospect Employer registration date must not be later than today.

message.name: INF_PROSPECTEMPLOYER_XFV_EMPLOYER_INFORMATION_COPIED
message.locale: Information has been copied from the original prospect employer record.

message.name: INF_PROSPECTEMPLOYER_XFV_EMPLOYER_TRADING_REGISTERED_NAME_NOT_MATCH
message.locale: The trading name and/or registered name on the prospect record differed to those already held for this employer. Please review to determine which details should be record for this employer.
